name: Law Office of Harry B. Siegel Reviews

review.title: “My experience at Siegellaw has allowed me to expand my experience with human resources and recruitment.”
review.pros: Pros – I am allowed to work with my husband and I am always meeting new people. I am also constantly learning the ins and outs of running a law practice.
review.cons: Cons – Sometimes I try to resolve situations from a human resource perspective and not through legal eyes. I also see how many people there are who are not loyal and try to connive their through work situations.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – An employee manual is an absolute must!

review.title: “My experience at the Law Office of Harry Siegel keeps me busy and on my toes everyday!”
review.pros: Pros – Helping people at their worst time in their lives. Working in a positive environment. Wonderful benefits packages.
review.cons: Cons – Some co-workers over step their bounds and do not follow directions; Firm owner puts off administrative decisions; whining clients
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Firm owner needs to be more involved with things aside from legal issues. Some co-workers need to have self awareness.
